text: Motion
Motion
Hiori, can I talk to you for a moment?
Oh, yes...!

I'm sorry, I was spacing out.
What is it?

It's nothing major.
Here, take this.
...Cookies, is it?

You didn't seem to eat much at dinner,
so if you feel like it, have some.

...I'm sorry for the trouble.
I didn't have much of an appetite today.

I know how it is. Sometimes when you're tired, you just don't
feel hungry. ...Hiori, are you pushing yourself too hard?
I'm not pushing myself too hard.

This training camp is a great opportunity to focus on lessons,
so it's natural for me to be more enthusiastic than usual.

You're reliable...!
It makes all the preparation worthwhile to hear you say that.

...But, taking breaks is also part of the training camp.
It's important to rest moderately and carry it over to tomorrow.
Carry it over to tomorrow...

...Certainly, since I have more time than usual,
I need to manage my time well.

...I'm sorry.
Perhaps I've been lax in self-management.

No, no, I'm not blaming you.
But I'd be happy if you took care of yourself too.
Yes, understood.

I'll have the cookies later.
...Thank you very much.
